title: Gabriel LaBelle
summary: Gabriel LaBelle (born 2001 or 2002) is a Canadian-American actor. He is best known for his leading role as young aspiring filmmaker Sammy Fabelman in Steven Spielberg's semi-autobiographical film The Fabelmans (2022), for which he received acclaim and won the Critics' Choice Movie Award for Best Young Performer.LaBelle has also appeared in the action film The Predator (2018), in an episode of the Netflix horror series Brand New Cherry Flavor (2021), and in the Showtime drama series American Gigolo (2022).
